column2: "Nna dɔm no mu asafohen no nyinara na Karea ba Johanan
column3: na Hosaia ba Jezania
column5: ofi ekumaba do kesi ɔkɛse do
column10: ma hɛn nkotoserɛ yi nsɔ w’enyi na yi EWURADZE
column12: nkaa yi nyinara; na hɛn nye kakraabi a yɛaka wɔ pii no mu
column13: dɛ mbrɛ w’enyiwa tua hɛn yi:"

column3: wo Nyankopɔn aakyerɛ hɛn kwan kor a yɛnnantsew mu
Matse hom asɛm: hwɛ
column4: mibeyi EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn mpaa dɛ mbrɛ hom aka yi; na ɔbɛba dɛ asɛm biara a EWURADZE dze bobua hom no
column5: mebɛpaa mu aka akyerɛ hom; mirinnsiw hom biribiara do."

column3: EWURADZE nyɛ nokwar dasefo turododo wɔ hɛn ntamu
column4: sɛ yɛannyɛ dɛ mbrɛ asɛm nyina a EWURADZE wo Nyankopɔn dze bɔsoma wo wɔ hɛn nkyɛn no tse a."

column3: sɛ omuo o
column4: yebetsie EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn a yɛasoma wo ne nkyɛn no ndze: ama sɛ yetsie EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn ne ndze a oeesi hɛn yie."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ dadu soe ekyir no
column3: EWURADZE n’asɛm baa nkɔnhyɛnyi Jeremia hɔ."
na dɔm no mu asafohen a wɔwɔ ne nkyɛn no nyina
column5: ofi ekumaba do kesi ɔkɛse do
column9: Israel Nyankopɔn a hom somaa me ne nkyɛn dɛ memfa hom nkotoserɛ nkɔto n’enyim no

column2: "Sɛ hom bɛda ho atsena asaase yi do a
column3: ɔnodze mibesi hom
column6: na menntutu hom ase: na menu moho wɔ mbusu a mabɔ hom no ntsi."

column2: "Mma hom nnsuro Babilɔnhen a hom suro no no; mma hom nnsuro no
column3: EWURADZE na ɔse: na mowɔ hom nkyɛn dɛ mebɛgye hom nkwa
column4: na meyi hom efi ne nsamu."

column3: na oehu hom mbɔbɔr
column4: na ɔama hom asan akɔ homankasa hom asaase do."

column3: Yɛrenntsena asaase yi do; ma dɛm no hom enntsie EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ne ndze;"
Oho; na yɛbɔkɔ Egypt asaase do
column6: eso yennkedzi edzibankɔm; na yɛatsena hɔ a;"

column3: Juda nkaasefo
column4: hom ntsie EWURADZE n’asɛm: mbrɛ dɔm EWURADZE Israel Nyankopɔn no se nye yi
column5: Sɛ hom dze si hom enyi do pɛpɛɛpɛ dɛ Egypt ara na hom bɔkɔ akɛyɛ amamforafo wɔ hɔ a:"

column3: afona a hom suro no bɔto hom Egypt asaase do hɔ
column4: na ɔkɔm a hom suro no betsiw hom dzendzenndzen wɔ Egypt hɔ; na hɔ na hom bowuwu."

column2: "Dɛm na ɔbɛyɛ hɔn mbarimba nyinara a wɔdze esi hɔn enyi do pɛpɛɛpɛ dɛ Egypt ara na wɔbɔkɔ akɛyɛ amamforafo wɔ hɔ no nye yi; wobowuwu afona
column3: na ɔkɔm
column4: na ɔyardɔm ano: na hɔn mu biara rennka anaa oefi mbusu a medze bɛba hɔn do no mu."

column3: Israel Nyankopɔn no se nye yi: Dɛ mbrɛ m’ebufuw na m’ebufuhyew ehue egu Jerusalɛm mba do no
column6: m’ebufuhyew bohue egu hom do: na hom bɛyɛ ekyiwadze
column9: na ahorohoraadze; na hom nnkohu bea yi bio."

column3: EWURADZE aka wɔ hom do dɛ
column4: Mma hom nnkɔ Egypt: hom nhu no kotoo dɛ medzi hom dase ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na hom adaadaa homankasa hom akra; osiandɛ hom somaa me EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ne nkyɛn
column3: dɛ
column5: hɛn Nyankopɔn mpaa ma hɛn; na dza EWURADZE hɛn Nyankopɔn bɛse nyina

column2: "na ndɛ da yi mapaa mu aka akyerɛ hom; na hom enntsie EWURADZE hom Nyankopɔn ne ndze
column3: wɔ dza ɔdze somaa me hom nkyɛn no mu biara mu."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei hom nhu no ampaara dɛ hom bowuwu afona
column3: ɔkɔm
column5: wɔ bea a hom kɔn dɔ dɛ hom bɛyɛ hɔ amamforafo no mu."
